rules_text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to green is less than five, Nylea isn’t a creature.
Whenever another creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
{1}{G}: Until end of turn, another target creature you control gains haste and can’t be blocked by creatures with power 3 or less.
